products.title: Daytona, Falcon Grey - Plantation Shutter
products.description: A deep, characterful grey with coffee undertones, the daytona in falcon grey is striking yet understated. The water-resistant faux wood makes it ideal for use in the kitchen or the bathroom, where it won't be prone to any warping or cracking. Choose from three unique shutter styles. Settle the falcon grey into a neutrally toned room filled with greys, beiges, oatmeals, and creams. The end result will be one of understated luxe, and you'll find it relaxing and serene, perfect for a bedroom or living room.

products.title: Daytona, Gainsborough - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In light oatmeal grey, the daytona gainsborough is sleek and subtle. Whether you choose the classic full height style, which fits the whole height of your window; the quirky caf style, which covers just a portion; or the versatile tier on tier, which gives two shutters to be opened separately, you've certainly made the right choice of colour. This versatile shade will match a number of colour schemes.

products.title: Daytona, Chalk White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The chalk white, from the daytona range, is the ideal addition to a country or vintage-style home. Choose from tier on tier, full height, or caf style shutters, and enjoy the long-lasting durability that the moisture-resistant faux wood brings. Team the chalk white with light, natural woods and soft sage greens in a rustic country home. The look will be natural and peaceful, making it perfect for a kitchen, home office, or living room.

products.title: Daytona, Boutique Cream - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in boutique cream offers a classic cream shade on a durable faux wood that you'd be hard-pressed to tell apart from the real thing. Choose from the traditional full height style, the unique caf style, and the versatile tier on tier style. Surround the boutique cream with soft mauves and lavenders for a relaxing and serene ambience in your master bedroom or even living room. Or, opt for a pretty pastel pink bathroom look, adding rose pinks to the lovely cream of the shutter.
